comment.body:
I tested it and but it doesn't work. If you just click around on the website aternos.org/servers/ it works totally fine, 
![Unbenannt](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/106693139/224860340-2fb9df7a-49b8-4a09-b7ea-e4133cf481ee.PNG)

but if you're clicking on 'your own server' -button you'll will be redirected to aternos.org/server/ (the 's' is missing now in the url) and then the Adguard filter doesn't work there anymore.
![Unbwenannt](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/106693139/224860250-2b26e6a1-2c8d-46a4-85ca-20bb0fa85036.PNG)

:wave: @zloyden. Note that this link may also use `/fr/` _(my case :relaxed:)_ or `/en/` instead of `/nl/` — depending on the [language chosen](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4764956/224859048-43476bd2-72cf-4e69-b956-26ded6765a53.png) by the user. :wink: Thank you in advance for the slight update! :v:

Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Yandex Browser

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://translate.yandex.ru/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. При блокировке рекламы на сайте, блок рекламы исчезает, но структура сайта нарушается. Основные фреймы не по центру и аватарка сдвинута вправо.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Выглядит вот так:</summary>

![Снимок экрана 2023-03-13 010703](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52073031/224704144-69c4a9ab-ea65-48ed-a119-c9ddef23af59.png)
</details>



<details><summary>Должно быть:</summary>

![Снимок экрана 2023-03-13 010733](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52073031/224704300-f77151a4-20d2-4128-98b8-fd16d4df0297.png)
</details>





### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

issue.title: elle.de
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

3.6.11, 7.12

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Smartphone, Desktop 

### Where is the problem encountered?

elle.de

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, I don't care about cookies

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. The blocks "Affiliate links" are not blocked on different pages of elle.de
https://www.elle.de/fashion-schuh-trend-sneaker-fruehling-2023

2. Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

I might find how to resolve the issue by myself.

PS. I also encountered additional issue a few minute ago. 
In case I've proceeded above steps however the LIVE SPORTS video shows only black screen on 'https://sports.news.naver.com/index', uninstalling & reinstalling 'Naver Live Streaming Connector' program will be helpful.

issue.title: Iplogger tracking in Email
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Mac ### AdGuard version G ### What type of problem have you encountered? AdGuard gets detected on a website ### Which browser(s) do you use? Opera ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? T ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard German filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots Hello! **_PLEASE READ THIS CAREFULLY_** This isn't the first time I've seen emails with tracking pixels from iplogger (https://iplogger.org/tracking-pixel/) lined up. Here is a fragment of one of such emails: ```
``` Therefore, I propose to add the following rules to block external tracking with such emails: ``` ​||iplogger.org^$third-party ||iplogger.com^$third-party ||maper.info^$third-party ||iplogger.ru^$third-party ||iplogger.co^$third-party ||2no.co^$third-party ||yip.su^$third-party ||iplogger.info^$third-party ||ipgrabber.ru^$third-party ||ipgraber.ru^$third-party ||iplis.ru^$third-party ||wl.gl^$third-party ||ed.tc^$third-party ||bc.ax^$third-party ||02ip.ru^$third-party ||ezstat.ru^$third-party ||iplogger.cn^$third-party ``` I believe this is a necessary action, as embedding such trackers as hidden pixels does serious damage to privacy by revealing information about User Agent, IP, country of residence, and the date the email was opened. Please add these rules to your list along with other types of trackers (pixels), as these are no different from them ### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
#### @Alex-302

> @contribucious [#144701 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/144701#issuecomment-1466852293)
> 
> Works on my end.

The solution of rejecting all cookies on this website?
Or that even with cookies, it works correctly on your side?

___

#### @Yiha777

Note that sometimes there may be _no_ video ads anyway though.

:arrow_right_hook: So, IMHO, you better to remove `goplay.be` from your `Allowlist` in AdGuard and activating at least **Dutch** in addition to **Base** for any present and future countermeasures.

:bulb: Activating **Base** filter only (even for a test, trying to be as minimalist as possible) will often block too many stuff (due to many _generic/broad_ rules in this filter, which are typically unblocked only for a given website in the appropriate language filter — the **Dutch** one in this case). :relaxed:

issue.title: Iplogger tracking in Email

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
Hello! **_PLEASE READ THIS CAREFULLY_** This isn't the first time I've seen emails with tracking pixels from iplogger (https://iplogger.org/tracking-pixel/) lined up. Here is a fragment of one of such emails: ```
``` Therefore, I propose to add the following rules to block external tracking with such emails: ``` ​||iplogger.org^$third-party ||iplogger.com^$third-party ||maper.info^$third-party ||iplogger.ru^$third-party ||iplogger.co^$third-party ||2no.co^$third-party ||yip.su^$third-party ||iplogger.info^$third-party ||ipgrabber.ru^$third-party ||ipgraber.ru^$third-party ||iplis.ru^$third-party ||wl.gl^$third-party ||ed.tc^$third-party ||bc.ax^$third-party ||02ip.ru^$third-party ||ezstat.ru^$third-party ||iplogger.cn^$third-party ``` I believe this is a necessary action, as embedding such trackers as hidden pixels does serious damage to privacy by revealing information about User Agent, IP, country of residence, and the date the email was opened. Please add these rules to your list along with other types of trackers (pixels), as these are no different from them

comment.body:
Added all except the following (not finding information about them:

```
||ed.tc^$third-party
||bc.ax^$third-party
```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: AdGuard Annoyances blocks link[rel=manifest]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://status.katys.cf/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. When the filter is disabled, a [`link[rel=manifest]`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/rel/manifest) element is present in the web page. But when the filter is enabled, the element is missing 

2. Screenshots

None (ask what kind you'd need if any, but I have no idea at first glance).

---

Thanks

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This rule works for removing the ad sequences in the series/movies, but the start is still there and therefore timing of subtitle is broken :(

https://www.amazon.de/-/en/gp/video/detail/B00FFS1G7S/language=en

`||atv-ps-*.amazon.*/cdp/catalog/GetPlaybackResources$replace=/\,"cuepointPlaylist":[\s\S]*{"cardType":"ad"[\s\S]*"VMAP_VAST"}\,/\,/,domain=amazon.*`

Have to investigate further where the initial ad screen is loaded from (text at beginning with the 12 seconds not showing though).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
